dc:title: This Money is Not Ours
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Explains their position on usury and derides the profit system. Says they try to withdraw from "THE SYSTEM" by following Matthew 25. Keywords: work
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 768 1960-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
